name: A Quiver of Crows
description: A twin-stick shmup set in a grim world cursed by demons and ghouls.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Dual-core 2.2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / ATI Radeon 4870 HD / Intel HD 4600 / or equivalent with at least 512 MB VRAM Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 or 10 Processor: Dual-core 2.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Equivalent of GeForce 9800 GTX / Radeon HD 5000 / Intel HD 5200 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Twin-stick controller highly recommended.

reviews.review_text: Love the graphical look of the game!  Love the atmosphere!  Love the music!  I'm not the greatest shmup player, but the difficulty presented here by the fast respawn rate of the enemies and their swarming tendencies is something I can get behind. It's hard for me, but it's an enjoyable chaos. To a better player the dificulty should bring a lot of joy, especially if played co-op with a friend,  If you're a fan of shmups and you like a challenge then you should give this game a try. If you tend to quit after you get swarmed and devoured on the first levels, then this is not the game for you.
